resources.string: My name is Hemant Kumar, Iam 22 years old. Iam living in Greater Noida, I have recently complete my graduation in Bachelor of Computer Application. I learned basics of C, C++,Java, JavaScript and few programming languages and I also have basic knowledge of data structure and currently Iam learning Flutter. As a fresher, I want to learn new things and improve my growth and skills. My hobby is watching cricket, web-series, playing mobile games and listening music. My short-term goal is to get a job in reputed company like yours to improve my growth, skills and learn new things. My long-term goal is, I wanted to see myself in a respected position in reputed organization and I also wanted to be the part of the success of that organization.
